title: Rules and regulations
context: ยง309-4 Rules and regulations. The department of budget and finance is authorized to establish rules and regulations relating to the participation of eligible institutions as defined in Public Law 89-329 and Public Law 89-287 or similar federal laws, allocation of available loan funds among the several participating eligible institutions, definition of necessary terms, and other matters relating to the program. [L 1966, c 16, pt of ยง2; HRS ยง309-4; am L 1968, c 49, pt of ยง2] Cross References Rulemaking, see chapter 91.
